sentence: Rooms are inviting and extremely big with high ceilings stocked with expensive free extras like TWG Tea and Nespreso coffee
Overall a total bliss and I rate this resort a 7 star in all aspects
the rooms are nice snorkling is good in that areaover priced and their are nicer places in the maldives

Nice view every where A lot of activity Warm and nice wither A very friendly staff It comes with a price which is a little bet higher then all the other 5 star hotels Take care if you are making your booking thru websites booking
Paradise but I am really disappointed that we could not have a late check without being charged

There are 4 restaurants in there we tried 3 indian grill and the main restaurant the food was fresh and perfectly cooked it was super delicious totally worth the price indian restaurant took around 250 USD per person it was a bite of every famous dish in India the chef in there explains every dish perfectly
Although it was expensive it was one of the most delicious meals we ’ve had
The staff are also amazing nothing was ever a problem and they do not charge for you to see the doctor or for any medication it is complimentary
Paddle boats are free of charge as the snorkeling equipment I believe
and the dining menu all are highly priced I understand that this also applies for most of the islands but its still very high كل شي مرتفع السعر الضرائب تصل ل23 بالمية والتوصيل 300 دولار لشخصالمطاعم
eg sarsara resturant offers dinner for 300 dolers items were very simple
My wife and I decided that as we were committing to the Maldives we would pay a bit more for a better experience that did n’t involve taking a third plane ride
the cost is Very overpriced 308 per person for almost 25 mins ride meals and activities prizes are exesicve
The prices were very high which makes the hotel a one time destination
If you want souvenirs I suggest do it in the airport as you will get the best quality and prices are fixed
Prices maybe it is better to state the prices already with the taxes included because when you get higher price than expected it is quite surprising
I would not pay the amount I did as I did not feel I got my moneys worth
Travel was n’t by speed boat as many of the hotels in Maldives tend to use do n’t care about price since you will be comfortable4
At the end they escalated to the management who eventually did not charge us for that
You can do many things in the island with cheaper price comparing to other hotel in Maldives
